acceptance-test-run.title: The @PodamCollection annotation should allow to set sizes on all collections and arrays
acceptance-test-run.name: thePodamCollectionAnnotationShouldWorkOnAllCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.CollectionAnnotationPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the List<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[vkuzQvHm4T should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element
Then the List should have exactly tyJZo1klDk elements
Then the array should not be null or empty
Then the array should have exactly 8FzlN2FLep elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{ZOezJsx6xh=BWII9QmuZw should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly nv58Sx53IF=I7WE6hM5A0 elements
